Name: Uranus
Introduction: Uranus is the seventh planet from the Sun and an ice giant. It is unique among the planets in the solar system due to its sideways rotation. Uranus has a faint ring system and a bluish color, resulting from the presence of methane in its atmosphere. It has a total of 27 known moons, including Miranda, Ariel, Umbriel, Titania, and Oberon.
